home.title: Complete Home Construction & Maintenance Services
home.description: Enhance your space with our professional cleaning, painting, and construcitons services. We combine craftsmanship with dependable results.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a dedicated team of professionals offering cleaning, painting, and renovation services for homes and properties throughout Stockholm.

footer.title: Your dream home starts with us

imageComparison.title: Quality That Speaks for Itself
imageComparison.description: Our work reflects our commitment to detail, whether it's a deep clean, a fresh coat of paint, or a complete renovation.

informative.title: Why Choose Professional Home Maintenance?
informative.text1: A well-maintained home improves comfort, value, and energy efficiency. Our services are designed to keep your home clean, beautiful, and functional year-round.

whatWeDo.title: Our Expertise in Private and Commercial Space

weCover.title: We got you covered!
weCover.service1Description: From top-to-bottom deep cleans to recurring maintenance, we help you keep your home fresh, healthy, and spotless.
weCover.service2Description: We paint walls, facade, trims, and everything in between, using high-quality paints and finishes that stand the test of time.
weCover.service3Description: Transform roofs, walls, ceilings, and more — our construction team improves both appearance and structure.
weCover.service4Description: We handle roof repairs, rebuilding, and other construction-related projects to keep your home secure and efficient.

rightSection.title: ROT Tax Deduction Available
rightSection.description: Take advantage of the ROT tax deduction for home services. Get up to 50% off labor costs, making your renovations and improvements more affordable.

leftSection.title: Free post-cleaning touch-up
leftSection.description: After each construction or painting project, we offer a complimentary clean-up service so you can immediately enjoy your refreshed space.

descriptions: Prietos Kompaniet began as a vision - to create something superior through years of experience, reinforced with discipline and hard work.
What started as a one-man business became a team of skilled professionals who all share the same commitment to high-quality.
We believe that your wallet and our shared environment must be treated the same way - sustainably
You tell us what you need, and we'll take care of everything else - We guarantee the best quality!
titles: From a vision to a company
From one person to a competent team

validation.contactRequired: Please enter your email or phone number
validation.tooManyRequests: Please wait 10 seconds before sending again

snippets.text: We care about your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal data you share with us. All data processing is done in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This policy explains what information we collect, why we collect it, and your rights regarding your personal data.

snippets.title: What are personal data?
snippets.text: Personal data refers to any information that can directly or indirectly identify an individual. This includes your name, email address, phone number, and any message you provide through our contact form.

snippets.title: Why do we collect data?
snippets.text: We only collect personal data in order to respond to your inquiries sent through our contact form.

snippets.title: Managing quote requests
snippets.text: When you reach out to us via the contact form, we use the information you provide to answer your request. No additional data is collected, stored, or shared beyond this purpose.

snippets.title: Managing contact requests
snippets.text: We only use your information to get back to you after you have contacted us. We do not use it for newsletters, marketing, or third-party services.

snippets.title: Managing orders
snippets.text: If your contact request leads to an order, we will use your data solely to carry out that service and any required communication related to it.

snippets.title: From whom are personal data collected?
snippets.text: All data is collected directly from you through the contact form. We do not collect personal data from any external sources or systems.

snippets.title: With whom are personal data shared?
snippets.text: We do not share your personal data with third parties unless legally required to do so.

snippets.title: Legal basis for handling personal data
snippets.text: We process your data based on your consent when you submit the contact form. If your request results in a service agreement, your data may also be processed under a legal obligation (e.g., accounting laws). We only keep your data as long as needed to fulfill your request or any resulting service.

snippets.title: Our obligations
snippets.text: We are responsible for protecting your personal data and ensuring it is only used for legitimate purposes. We do not store, analyze, or resell your data.

snippets.title: Contact information if you have questions or want to exercise your rights
snippets.text: If you have questions or wish to exercise your rights regarding your personal data, please contact us at: kontakt@wikbloms.se

snippets.title: Security measures
snippets.text: We process all personal data securely and in accordance with applicable laws. As we only use a contact form, the data you send is handled manually and not stored in any system beyond the email communication required to answer your inquiry.

snippets.title: 1. Introduction
snippets.text: These terms and conditions apply to all services provided by Wikblom’s. By booking our services, you agree to the following terms.

snippets.title: 2. Services Offered
snippets.text: Wikblom’s provides home improvement and maintenance services including but not limited to cleaning, painting, renovation, and construction work. Services may be provided to both private individuals and commercial property owners.

snippets.title: 3. Quotes and Pricing
snippets.text: We provide preliminary quotes based on initial contact and may revise these after an on-site inspection. Final pricing will be communicated before work begins. All prices are stated in SEK and may be subject to applicable taxes.

snippets.title: 4. Booking and Payments
snippets.text: A percentage of the total cost is invoiced and payable upfront, in accordance with legal requirements. The remaining balance is due upon completion of the work. We accept payment via invoice and direct bank transfer.

snippets.title: 5. Subcontracting
snippets.text: For construction-related projects, we may engage carefully selected subcontractors from our trusted network. All painting and cleaning work is performed by our in-house team.

snippets.title: 6. Cancellations and Rescheduling
snippets.text: We do not currently offer a general cancellation or rescheduling policy. If changes are necessary, please contact us directly and we will do our best to accommodate reasonable requests.

snippets.title: 7. Warranties and Guarantees
snippets.text: No general warranty is provided. Project-specific guarantees may be offered in writing depending on the type of service and agreement.

snippets.title: 8. Liability
snippets.text: Wikblom’s is not liable for damages caused by incorrect information provided by the client or for circumstances beyond our control, such as extreme weather or third-party delays.

snippets.title: 9. Complaints and Disputes
snippets.text: Any complaints should be submitted in writing as soon as possible after the issue is discovered. We follow industry-standard procedures in resolving disputes and comply with Swedish consumer protection laws.

snippets.title: 10. Data Protection
snippets.text: We only collect and store personal data necessary to carry out our services, such as contact details provided through our contact form. For more information, see our Privacy Policy.

snippets.title: 11. Changes to Terms
snippets.text: Wikblom’s reserves the right to update these terms and conditions without prior notice. The current version will always be available on our website.

snippets.title: 12. Governing Law
snippets.text: These terms are governed by Swedish law. Any disputes will be handled by a Swedish court of law.
